line_1: And hear her Hymns your happy Care avow:
line_2: See rescu'd Britain at your Altars bow:

line_1: Millions to him their grateful thanks avow,
line_2: And conquest twines her laurel round his brow.

line_1: Would he the genuine draught avow,
line_2: Would gracious PHOEBUS tell me how,

line_1: An' some, their New-light fair avow,
line_2: But new-light herds gat sic a cowe,

line_1: An' some, their New-light fair avow,
An' some, their New-light fair avow,
line_2: Till now amaist on ev'ry knowe

line_1: And on his honour must avow,
line_2: But still he could not but allow,

line_1: There be, perhaps, who barren hearts avow,
line_2: Cold as the rocks on Torneo's hoary brow;

line_1: STRAFFORD and LAUD, who boldly dar'd avow
line_2: The trait'rous doctrines taught by Tories now;

line_1: And hear her hymns your happy care avow.
line_2: See rescu'd BRITAIN, at your Altars bow,

line_1: While visions, as poetic eyes avow,
line_2: Cling to each leaf and swarm on every bough:
